Crypto Seeks to Make Mark on U.S. Elections During 'Super Tuesday' https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/03/05/crypto-seeks-to-make-mark-on-us-elections-during-super-tuesday/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines P3APZXYJ7VFU3KIAGH4FZ23TB4 Jesse HamiltonThe long list of primary elections Tuesday across 15 U.S. states will steer the fates of many seats in Congress and further solidifies the presidential showdown later this year, but Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong said it's also a "chance to send a message" to federal politicians who've declined to come up with crypto policies.
